Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only stands as a testament to our commitment to excellence but also carries a unique value proposition tailored to enhance your specific needs. Given its unparalleled features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value to you. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $15000. This special price is reflective of the high regard we have for you as a potential buyer and our desire to ensure you receive the best possible value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can significantly contribute to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
